content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Friday May 16, 2025 

Today is a “A” Day 

 

  • We are excited to announce that the last Liveschool Shop order form is open From May 15th through the 21st. Don’t miss out on your chance to grab some amazing items. It is also your last opportunity to donate points to the Team Contest. We would like to extend a huge thank you to our Tech Help department for their expertise and to our incredible parent volunteers who have tirelessly packed thousands of orders this year. Your dedication and hard work have made the LiveSchool Shop a success! 

 

  • The Science Club will have two final meetings. The last regular Monday meeting will be on May 19 in room 267. On Wednesday, June 4, there will be the trout release event at the state park. For more information, see Mr. Scrivo 

 

  • Introduction to Bagpiping will not meet on Monday May 19th. Our next meeting will be on Monday June 2nd. 

 

  • The Knitting Club will be meeting on Monday after school. This will be the last meeting of the year. Monday, June 2nd. 

 

Today’s lunch is pizza, Caesar salad, and mango peach applesauce 

Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND.  

As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
